name: Sweet Coconut Rice
author: Melucy
summary: Delicious sweet coconut rice that can be thrown in a rice cooker or done on the stove. This is great when paired with a Thai green curry or stir-fry! Ideally, make this with either jasmine rice or long-grain white rice.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste
1 tablespoon shredded coconut, or to taste  (Optional)
directions: Stir rice, coconut milk, and water together in a saucepan
Bring the mixture to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, place a cover on the saucepan, and simmer until the majority of the liquid has been absorbed by the rice, 15 to 20 minutes
Leaving saucepan on the burner, turn heat off and let rice steam until sticky, about 5 to 10 minutes more
